titleStmt.title: A speech made before the Lords in the upper House by Francis Rous Esquire, March the 16th. 1640. Against Dr. Cossens, Dr. Maynwaring, and Dr. Beale; upon the complaint of Mr. Peter Smart.
titleStmt.author: Rous, Francis, b. 1615.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
